mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment(com_idx, stock_idx, user_id, com_content, regdate) values(#{com_idx}, #{stock_idx}, #{user_id}, #{com_content}, now())
mapper.select: select count(com_idx) from tbl_comment where stock_idx=#{stock_idx};
select count(com_com_idx) from tbl_com_comment where com_idx=#{com_idx} and stock_idx=#{stock_idx};
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_com_comment(stock_idx, com_idx, com_com_idx, user_id, com_com_content, regdate) values(#{stock_idx}, #{com_idx}, #{com_com_idx}, #{user_id}, #{com_com_content}, now())
mapper.select: select * from tbl_com_comment where stock_idx=#{stock_idx} and com_idx=#{com_idx}
